function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of international solidarity in addressing COVID-19 and the SDGs","Impact":"Ineffective global response to COVID-19 and diminished progress towards the SDGs","Mitigation":"Promoting greater awareness and understanding of the interconnectedness of global health and development priorities","Technologies":"Communication technologies for facilitating global collaboration and coordination","People":"Rich and poor countries, individual world leaders, international development community","Owner":"UN, world leaders, international development organizations"},{"Description":"Fractured state of global health diplomacy","Impact":"Lack of coordinated actions and collaborations in addressing global health issues","Mitigation":"Engaging in diplomatic efforts to bridge the gaps and strengthen alliances among nations","Technologies":"Diplomatic communication tools and platforms","People":"Global health policymakers, diplomats, world leaders","Owner":"UN, global health organizations"},{"Description":"Potential reduction in political support for aid and development priorities","Impact":"Diminished resources for crucial development and health programs, leading to increased risks for vulnerable populations","Mitigation":"Advocacy for sustained political commitment to aid and development, highlighting the long-term benefits and impact of such support","Technologies":"Advocacy and lobbying platforms, data analytics for demonstrating the benefits of aid and development programs","People":"International development community, aid recipients, vulnerable populations","Owner":"Development organizations, advocacy groups"}]}
